titleStmt.title: A courtly controuersie, betweene looue and learning Pleasauntlie passed in disputation, betweene a ladie and a gentleman of Scienna. Wherein is no offence offered to the vertuous nor any ill motion to delight the vicious.
titleStmt.author: Munday, Anthony, 1553-1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Charlewood, for Henrie Carre, dwelling in the olde Chaunge, at the signe of the three Connies,

notesStmt.note: "To the freendly reader" signed: A. Munday.
Running title reads: A disputation betweene looue and learning.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
